cause.description:
BREATHE California of Los Angeles County (BREATHE LA) is a non-profit organization dedicated to the future of clean air and healthy lungs in Los Angeles County through leadershp in advocacy, innovation in enviroemental education and a commitment to advancing research
1. Clean the Air in Los Angeles
2. Educated all about various Lung issues
cause.mission: Promoting Clean Air and Healthy Lungs through education, research and Techonolgy
cause.name: BREATHE California of Los Angeles County
